about_us_text: 💎 BeerBots - a team of 4 experienced developers specializing in the development of software products using JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. 🚀 We are passionately dedicated to our work and strive to create quality and innovative solutions for our clients. We have deep knowledge and experience in programming with these languages. 👨‍💻 We take pride in our ability to solve complex tasks, learn new technologies, and apply cutting-edge development practices. We constantly strive for self-improvement and staying up-to-date with the latest trends in our field.
services_text: 🤖 Bots: We create bots for various platforms such as Telegram and Discord. ✅ Checkers: We develop checkers to automatically check various data, such as account or product checkers. 🔍 Parsers: We create parsers to extract data from websites or APIs. ⚙️ Automation: We help automate processes in your company to increase work efficiency. 🔑 Regers: We develop regers that help you create and manage accounts. 💻 Web3 scripts: We create scripts for working with Web3, including the development of decentralized applications, blockchains and smart contracts. 🌐 Websites: We create custom websites using modern frameworks and technologies. 🔐 Bruters: We develop bruters to check the security of passwords or accounts. 🔄 API: We create and integrate APIs for data exchange between different applications.
faq_text: 🔍 Answers to frequently asked questions: 🔻 Do we provide a guarantee? - Yes, the guarantee is valid for 30 days from the moment of launching the project. 🔻 What is the minimum order price? - Pricing policy starts at $75. 🔻 Do we accept payment in the form of cryptocurrency? - Yes, any stablecoins. 🔻 Do we work through a guarantor? - Yes. 🔻 What are the deadlines for order fulfillment? - The terms depend on the complexity of the project, but on average it is 1 to 7 days. 🔻 Do we write in languages other than JS/TS/PY? - In most cases, these languages are sufficient for any services we provide. In rare cases, we can use GO/Solidity.
